title: Level Headed Gaming LF support Gold+
body:
Greetings, 

We are looking for a support main who is interested in joining a serious team that will compete in online tournaments and practice most weeknights in ranked 5s. 
**Requirments**
A mature player 
A good ammount of game knowledge. 
Someone that is willing to grow with the team (but at the same time we are not looking to train someone up). 
Gold+ rating


Please add Daemonkz ingame for a trial.

replies.body: I'm plat 4, would be interested if you are still looking

This position already filled or still open? I've sent an add to Daemonkz. I'm currently gold four and climbing I can only assume. I play a lot of alistar (over 300 games), you can look me up.
Cheers.
